text: cutting-edge tech hangs at the top of
the list when it comes to what today's
buyer wants out of their vehicles their
devices set the technological pace and
they expect their car to keep up
AWS can enable you to develop your own
intelligent unique and personalized
automotive experiences to keep your
brand at the forefront of customers
digital lives you can create a
personalization app that securely stores
the customers digital profile in the AWS
cloud then by the time the driver
buckles into any of your vehicles
they're identified and authenticated
initiating a personalized experience
before they've shifted out of park the
AWS technologies have checked their
calendar and noted upcoming appointments
and destinations the technology is
proactive and contextually aware just
like a personal assistant so
interactions are natural and intelligent
on the road there's no more fumbling
around with the navigational phone as
its cruising the vehicle monitors status
and considers things like locations
times schedules and previous history and
uses machine learning to make
intelligent recommendations for example
they won't have to keep an eye on the
fuel gauge instead the vehicle
proactively recommends the perfect gas
station on the way not to mention
offering a discount at just the right
time and while your customers are on the
go it doesn't mean they can't be
productive their vehicle can understand
the context of communications so they
can get things done while driving
without being distracted if there's an
incoming request for a meeting the
vehicle automatically serves up
availability information straight from
their calendar these are just a handful
of examples of how you can take your
brand to the next level of
personalization with AWS products and
solutions aws.amazon.com / automotive
you
